Levels.x1: No motor noise, no environment noise

targetDeg.Description: Target location, ranges from -90 to +90 deg, with 0 deg at the top

thetaDots.Description: Angular velocity, refresh rate was 60 Hz

vs.Description: Horizontal cart velocity (underlying model, not shown)

participantActions.Description: Whether or not participant pressed a button on each frame (boolean)

participantForceMags.Description: Magnitude of participant-applied force on each frame (or 0 if no button pressed)

computerActions.Description: Whether or not computer pressed a button on each frame (boolean)

Levels.x0: No action was taken this frame (participant or computer)
Levels.x1: An action was taken this frame (participant or computer)

computerForceMags.Description: Magnitude of computer-applied force on each frame (or 0 if no button pressed)

actualActions.Description: Whether there was a resulting action on this frame (boolean)

actualForceMags.Description: Actual magnitude of applied force this frame

buttonPressTimes.Description: Time associated with each button press

frameCount.Description: Number of frames in this block (int)

steeringTime.Description: Total time for this block (seconds) - max block length is 60 seconds

pointsThisRound.Description: Number of points earned this round

scaledPointsThisRound.Description: Number of points earned this round, scaled to be out of 250

keyPressTimes.Description: Time of each key press relative to start of block - may be more accurate than buttonPressTimes
